post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
From: "Lolly Adekemi" <lolly_adekemi@keane.com>  
To: "kwon96@yahoo.com" <kwon96@yahoo.com>
Subject: Unix Developers: Job Opportunities with Keane, Inc.
Date: Tue, 13 Jan 2004 20:49:12 -0500

Hi,

My name is Lolly Adekemi, and I am a Recruiting Associate with Keane,
Inc. based out of Boston, MA.

I am writing to inform you that Keane will be having an Open House in
Toronto once again on Tuesday, January 20, 2004, to support our efforts
to staff our Halifax based Application Development Center.  We are
currently looking for Unix developers and Systems Administrators with
hands-on experience with one of the following skills: Perl, Java, Sybase and
C#.

If you or a friend have these required skill sets and will be
interested in attending the open house, please register at
www.keane.com/careers/toronto.   Please note that these positions are in Halifax, Nova
Scotia and would require relocation.

If you would be unable to attend but have the required skill sets, then
please apply on our website at www.keane.com.  Should you have any
questions, please feel free to contact me.  

Thank you in advance for your response.

Sincerely,

Lolly Adekemi
Recruiting Associate
Keane, Inc
Lolly_Adekemi@keane.com
post.title: Unix Developers: Job Opportunities with Keane, Inc.
